entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: W 12 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
